subscription.heroSubtitle: Personal banking services tailored to your needs and interests
subscription.description: Subscribe to the TBC Concept package and enjoy both banking and non-banking advantages.

bankingServices.bankOperations: Perform banking transactions remotely via Digital Bank
bankingServices.trustedFinancialPartner: Your trusted partner in financial advice and operations

digital_package_description: TBC Concept Digital Package is for those who engage in banking daily, enjoy nonbanking offers and products and prefer to manage their finances and transactions on their own, without a personal banker’s assistance.
premium_package_description: TBC Concept Premium Package client relationship format offers Personal Banker's services, along with other banking and nonbanking benefits. Your Personal Banker's main goal is to make your life easier, provide you with top quality services and contribute to your comfort and well-being.
package_360_description: TBC Concept 360 package is tailored to those, who need even more financial tools, bigger array of opportunities and Personal Banker's support, along with banking and non-banking benefits.
